Game.Name: Wai Wai World 2 - SOS!! Paseri Jou (Japan)
Game.plot: Wai Wai World 2: SOS!! Paseri Jou is an Action game, developed and published by Konami,which was released in Japan in 1991.Cheat: Passwords.The password system in Wai Wai World 2 is made up by a grind of 4 vertical rows with 6 spaces in each. An "X" means that the space should be filled, while an "O" means that it should be left empty.
Game.Notes: The player begins the game by choosing one of four character groups which consist of three different Konami characters. Most of the levels are spoofs of various different levels from Konami games. The gameplay is mostly like a straight forward platform game, similar to Contra. In these levels you start off with the main character Rickle (or Rikkuru), who by collecting a special power-up, can transform temporarily into one of the three different characters the player chose at the beginning of the game. There are also space shooter, driving, and puzzle levels. After certain levels you can choose different paths which consist of different stages.
